QuestData.Title: The Battle Resumes!
QuestData.Description: Word is in from Andorhal, $n. The battle has resumed.$b$bIt has become somewhat well-known among the Alliance forces that you're a hero of the first battle of Andorhal. Thassarian has requested your presence immediately.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Thassarian at Andorhal in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Thassarian at Andorhal in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: Word has it that you helped those farmers arm themselves. Well, now they've initiated the attack without my order! They've forced my hand.$b$bThe battle has resumed. This time, we fight the Forsaken... and I fight Koltira, my old brother of the Ebon Blade.
